name: Silhouette of a Massacre
description:
Silhouette of a Massacre is a 2D, text adventure game with pixel-art art style. This game mainly focus on the story revolve around the main character, and how he ultimately finds out the "truth". Following Richard Dawson and his adventure to find his missing wife.

This game is full of suspense and horrific sound effects, so those with a faint of hearts. Please be aware of these facts. Else, Enjoy!
